title: Datasets for Common Activities
text: package contains several datasets useful daily activities processed different sources practical usefulness.

title: Datasets for Common Activities
text: Currently following sets available: geo_italia: long-format table containing 4 NUTS levels EUROSTAT Italy. decodifica_comuni: wide-format table containing old new Italian municipalities (higher level denomination) names. codice_ateco: long-format table containing NACE Rev.2 levels Italian language. agenzie_provincia: simple table containing number insurance agencies subagents Italian province. Strictly internal use .

title: Datasets for Common Activities
text: dataset 7904 observations 5 columns. Curated Fabio Sgobio, Alejandro Abraham.
code: head(geo_italia) #         nuts1    nuts2  nuts3          comune # 1: Nord-ovest Piemonte Torino          AgliÃ¨ # 2: Nord-ovest Piemonte Torino         Airasca # 3: Nord-ovest Piemonte Torino    Ala di Stura # 4: Nord-ovest Piemonte Torino Albiano d'Ivrea # 5: Nord-ovest Piemonte Torino          Almese # 6: Nord-ovest Piemonte Torino         Alpette #    Codice Comune formato numerico # 1:                           1001 # 2:                           1002 # 3:                           1003 # 4:                           1004 # 5:                           1006 # 6:                           1007

title: Datasets for Common Activities
text: Even load innteamUtils package R session, datasets available loaded current enviornment. load need call explicitly data() function. example:
code: # Call the dataset: don't worry, it is a "promise" until you use it. data("agenzie_provincia")  # Calculate the Mean  agenzie_provincia[, lapply(.SD, mean), .SDcols = c('agenzie', 'subagenti')] #     agenzie subagenti # 1: 97.12727  937.7818

title: Innovation Team Standard R Theming kit
text: great deal current package dedicated theming reporting means. Communication central skill nowadays data analysis, therefore following achievements seeked: - Standardization: sign professionalism, makes greater visual impact allows better storytelling. - Time Saving: standard themes provide code arrangements, saving typing thinking visual aspects. - Spillover Effect: time energy available analytical aspects.

title: Innovation Team Standard R Theming kit
text: purposes, package contains: - Report PDF/HTML ready: curated skeleton easy lightweight rendering thanks pagedown, front back cover. Available Rmarkdown Templates. - Quick HTML Document: simple HTML document, lightweight concise. Available Rmarkdown Templates. - ggplot2 theme: ready ---box theme plots via theme function. - + theme_innteam() - PNG export: optional ggplot2 theme, option allows print plots PNG’s brand bottom banner. - export_png()

title: Authors and Citation
text: Alejandro Abraham. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Abraham (2022). innteamUtils: Utilities: Themes, Datasets Functions Innovation Team. R package version 1.5.0, https://aba-innovationteam.github.io/innteamUtils/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {innteamUtils: Utilities: Themes, Datasets and Functions by Innovation Team},   author = {Alejandro Abraham},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 1.5.0},   url = {https://aba-innovationteam.github.io/innteamUtils/}, }

title: Utilities: Themes, Datasets and Functions by Innovation Team
text: innteamUtils offers collection functions, themes datasets enhance productivity daily coding reproducibility throughout organization. light dependencies (future), better performance ease maintenance. also, part philosophy, adopts “fully integrated end--end platform” production pipeline thanks following packages frameworks: General Framework: data.table completely written base R blazing fast. ggplot2 static graphics production-ready plots (tidyverse package). plotly interactive graphics well-adopted rmarkdown shiny. highcharter advanced interactive graphics (coming soon). reactable: interactive static production-ready tables. reactablefmtr: interactive tables infografics (Coming soon). bslib Shiny apps productiong-grade UI features.. pagedown: unique framework PDF + HTML documentation. Fast rendering thanks chrome browsing instead LaTeX. near future plan migrate .Rmd templates Quarto soon mature technology. Machine Learning: mlr3verse seeks production-ready approach like python R fully built upon data.table uses R6 objects (stability speed).

title: Utilities: Themes, Datasets and Functions by Innovation Team
text: license, Internal Use . strictly forbidden replicate distribute code outside organization.

title: Utilities: Themes, Datasets and Functions by Innovation Team
text: development version can installed GitHub : Stable versions contacting email. latest stable version 1.0.0.

title: Utilities: Themes, Datasets and Functions by Innovation Team
text: main components present latest stable version : - rmarkdown Report Templates: - HTML Doc quick light documents HTML format. - Paged Report professional looking PDF HTML reports (lightweight fast rendering). - RStudio Project Templates: standardized templates reproducibility optimal workflow specific task. - Shiny Theme Templates: standardized CSS JS structures production-grade Apps. - ggplot2 theme: calling plot(...) + theme_innteam() - reactable theme: calling reactable(..., theme = react_format) - plotly theme: calling df %>% plot_ly(...) %>% plotly_innteam() - Datasets: tables useful common issues regarding data cleaning activities (e.g. codice_ateco decodifica_comuni). - Operators: expansions operators improve readability code. (%notin%, %contains%). also possible probably convenient set themes session options avoid verbose code enable easier reproducibility, especially documents: Next elements construction ad-hoc functions data.table data wrangling manipulation mlr3 specific procedures.

title: Utilities: Themes, Datasets and Functions by Innovation Team
text: clean_names: transforms snake_case column names: Nome.1 = nome_1. rounder: helper function round vectors desired closest number: rounder(93, 5, '") = 95. diff_years: calculates distance years dates. .error, .interger64: helper function evaluates boolean.

title: Utilities: Themes, Datasets and Functions by Innovation Team
text: (Comin soon) functionality element information usage can found respective vignette. vignette("Datasets") explore Innovation Team Standard R Theming kit. vignette("theme_innteam") Datasets Daily Activities. access may also type vignette("innteamUtils") RStudio quick-start guide.

title: Utilities: Themes, Datasets and Functions by Innovation Team
text: doubt, idea issue please contact us via email : .abraham@innovatioteam.eu

title: Check if an expression returns an error — is.error
text: TRUE/FALSE

title: Check if an expression returns an error — is.error
text: Berry Boessenkool, berry-b@gmx.de, May 2016

title: Check if an expression returns an error — is.error
code: is.error(  log(3)              ) #> [1] FALSE is.error(  log("a")            ) #> [1] TRUE is.error(  log(3),   tell = TRUE ) #> [1] FALSE is.error(  log("a"), tell = TRUE ) #> Note in is_error: Error in log("a") : non-numeric argument to mathematical function #> [1] TRUE stopifnot( is.error( log("a")  )  ) # or shorter: is.error(  log("a"), force = TRUE) #> [1] TRUE # is.error(  log(3),   force = TRUE) stopifnot(is.error(  is.error(log(3), force = TRUE)  ))
